Name: SUBURI
About the game: NOTE : This App is a batting simulator NOT a usual video game This App is a VR batting simulator for kids who wants to improve their batting skills. The pitcher (right handed) will throwing balls into your 16 point pitch zone randomly so you can train your hand-eye coordination at home. *Recommend playing this App from 12 old or more. *Please be aware that set your VIVE room scale before you start this game, power on at minimum one of the controller. *You need minimum 2.2m x 1.5m space for play this app. Features : - 20 ball for one set - Available to select throwing speed between 70 km to 200 km - Pitcher throwing ball into 16 point pitch zone randomly (9 point strike zone â€“ 7 point ball zone) - Display each hit angle - Display fly distance if hit (sweet spot differentiated by sound and flight distance) - Input your body height to calculate accurate players strike zone - Available to set Strike zone On / Off - You also can using 'Space' key on your keyboard for pitching
